#summary Development Road Map for BigBlueButton

= Release 0.63 =
This upcoming release will include
  * Improve stability of VoIP
  * Refactor presentation module (client) to use Mate
  * Add annotations (whiteboard) to the presentation module
  * Support for multiple file formats in slide uploads (.doc, .xls, .ppt, .txt, etc.)
  * Localization
  * API for interfacing with 3rd party applications

For a full list of what's planned see [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list?can=2&q=milestone=Release0.63 issues tagged for 0.63 release].
